testcase.name: Entity identifier matching filter test
testcase.description: Tests of entity identifier matching filter.

variation.name: Entity identifier matching filter
variation.description: Three facts, 4 contexts, each other two share scheme/value, match of tripple of fact variables to guarantee each of scheme/value and tandem filtering considered. The two scheme namespace URI's have no escaped or capitalization differences.

variation.name: Same as V-01, but using w3c spec namespace URI example focusing on letter-case and escaping sensitivity.
variation.description: Same as V-01 but see W3C instructions on comparing namespace URIs (http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/#NSNameComparison), examples, used here. Tests this w3c requirement in comparing namespace URIs: "the comparison is case-sensitive, and no %-escaping is done or undone".
